jobItem.title: Middle+ Front-End Developer
jobItem.short: Development of the project from scratch. The core technology React.js, the rest will be determined along with the team.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Responsibilities

  • Agile development of web applications with an E-Commerce focus

Requirements

  • Strong practical knowledge of JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3
  • Practical experiences of React and Redux
  • Proficient in GIT through BitBucket, GitHub or GitLab
  • You feel obligated to create top-notch responsive UI/UX solutions
  • You enjoy developing and curious about new trends and technologies in IT field and you want to keep learning modern development methods and tools
  • Striving to use best practices in your code
  • Practical experiences of SASS
  • Having experience with TDD and understanding its concepts and benefits
  • Proficient in the investigation of issues with debugging tools without the requirement of logging through the console

Desirable

  • Being familiar and up to date with recent CSS and ECMAScript specifications
  • Practical experience of front-end dev-ops tools like Webpack, Babel
  • Previous experience on PHP
  • Practical experience with Node.js
  • Understanding of functional programming
  • Practical experiences of MongoDB, DynamoDB or other NoSQL solution
  • Experience on a strictly typings like TypeScript / Flow or any other strictly typed language
  • Having a background, understanding or even better contribution of on the open-source

What's in it for you

  • You get the unique opportunity to build a new company to witness and endorse them with their own ideas
  • Several longer-term opportunities, including forming a part of the studio specialized in the next generation E-Commerce solution of retail industry

node.title: You should agree with our terms
As a result of submitting completed form, your personal data will be processed by Whale Group and its subsidiary entities worldwide. Please read our Privacy Notice for more information.
